data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Donato, Mariano (2011): A new species of the genus Mesosmittia Brundin, 1956 (Diptera: Chironomidae) from the Neotropics with a cladistic analysis of the genus using quantitative characters. Zootaxa 2836: 51-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206685
